Welcome To Standards

Author: Scott Hurrey
Categories: [‘Caliper’, ‘LTI’]
Tags: [‘developer’, ‘lti’, ‘standards’, ‘caliper’, ‘ims’, ‘ims global’, ‘imsglobal’]

This is space for the community to make contributions around working with educational technology standards. We are especially interested in standards put forth by IMS Global.

Any member of the community can contribute documentation. We do not intend to document specification completely but rather to demonstrate and document experiences of integrating with Blackboard using these standards.
